isis.stitle: ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - DESCRIPTION - SPARE "INPUT AND OUTPUT" FEATURES

svcproc.title: SPARE "INPUT AND OUTPUT" FEATURES
svcproc.para: The spare inputs/outputs are circuits that can be used to activate up to four auxiliary functions programmed into the electronic control unit (ECU) of the transmission. International installed options that use the spare input/output circuits include Two-Speed Axle shift controls and Williams Blue Ox Exhaust Brake on the 2000/4000/8000 model vehicles. These installations are discussed later in this section.
Refer to the Allison WT Service Manual for additional information on customer installations utilizing this feature.
